actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend title 28 of the United States Code to permit the resignation with the right to continue receiving pay to certain Federal judges at age 65 who have completed 15 years judicial service.

summary.text: Permits a Federal judge or justice who is at least 65 years of age and has served at least 15 years to retire at full pay.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 28 of the United States Code to permit the resignation with the right to continue receiving pay to certain Federal judges at age 65 who have completed 15 years judicial service.
